title: Abbott and Enanta Present Positive Initial Results from Phase 2 Study of ABT-450/r for Treatment of Hepatitis C
description: ABBOTT PARK, Ill. and WATERTOWN, Mass., Nov. 1, 2010 /PRNewswire-FirstCall/ -- Abbott (NYSE: ABT) and Enanta Pharmaceuticals today announced positive results from a Phase 2 study of ABT-450/r, an | ABBOTT PARK, Ill. and WATERTOWN, Mass., Nov. 1, 2010 /PRNewswire-FirstCall/ -- Abbott (NYSE: ABT) and Enanta Pharmaceuticals today announced positive results from a Phase 2 study of ABT-450/r, an
